info.name: Custom osu!
info.description:
Features:
Sleek transparent design
Custom background wallpapers
Custom accent color on select elements

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles: https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui
info.additionalInfo:
V1.4: added solid color wallpaper mode
V1.3: added 2 preset wallpapers, "Junction" and "Fire Blossom"
V1.2: fixes, new preset wallpaper "Planet"
V1.1.1: improvements
V1.1: applied to search
V1: release

options.label: Wallpaper
